text: Samajhauta kivem rahega jadom ki sathiti iha hai ki jekara uha tuhade ute kasu pa'una tam na' tuhade sabadha vica risatedari da sanamana karana ate na samajhaute da. Uha tuhanu apani'am zubani galam nala satusata karana cahude hana para unham de dila inakari hana ate unham vicom zi'adatara visavasaghati hana
